statements: SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE sales_count > 100
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_reports WHERE product_name = 'Product A'
SELECT report_id, sales_count FROM sales_reports ORDER BY sales_count DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE revenue < 500.00
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_reports WHERE sales_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT report_id, product_name, sales_count, revenue FROM sales_reports WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%'
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_count) AS total_sales FROM sales_reports GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT report_id, product_name, sales_count, revenue FROM sales_reports ORDER BY sales_count DESC, revenue ASC
SELECT product_name, AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue FROM sales_reports GROUP BY product_name HAVING avg_revenue > 100
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity_sold, total_revenue FROM sales INNER JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE AND category LIKE 'C%';
SELECT product_name, category, total_revenue FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE total_revenue > 100 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT product_name, amount FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, price, quantity, amount FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT product_id, month, year, total_revenue FROM revenue WHERE year = 2022 AND month IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, price FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 AND category LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_price ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY category, price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' OR email LIKE '%@test.com%' ORDER BY email
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT report_date, top_selling_product, revenue FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT product_name, category, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name, category HAVING total_sales > 100 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, sales.sale_date FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE sales.quantity_sold >= 5 ORDER BY sales.sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT region_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM regions JOIN sales_reports ON regions.region_id = sales_reports.report_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
